data.title: European Wax Center
data.meta_description: Whether you're shopping for someone else—or just treating yourself—EWC has dozens of ways save while getting seriously smooth skin. Learn more today.
data.text:
*Valid from August 1 – 31, 2024 at participating centers and online while supplies last. Cart price must be equal to or greater than $50.00 before tax and after discount(s) are applied to qualify for the free Summer Oasis Travel Kit and free shipping (for online purchases). Discount will be applied at time of redemption and auto-applied online at check out. All products must be purchased in a single transaction to qualify. No substitutions. Does not apply to previous purchases. Subject to sales taxes where applicable. May not be combined with other promotions or discounts on products. Additional restrictions may apply, see participating center or an EWC associate for additional details. European Wax Center locations are individually owned and operated. © 2024 EWC Franchisor LLC. All Rights Reserved.

*Valid for 50% off an eyebrow tint from May 1st– August 31st, 2024 at participating European Wax Center locations for qualifying guests. To qualify, guest must not have received the eyebrow tint service at any European Wax Center location at the time of redemption. Discount will be applied at time of redemption. Subject to sales taxes where applicable. Offer is one time use only and may not be combined with other promotions or discounts on the new service(s) in a single transaction. Pricing and participation may vary. Additional restrictions may apply, see participating center or an EWC associate for details. European Wax Center locations are individually owned and operated. ©2024 EWC Franchisor LLC. All Rights Reserved.

Guests who haven't seen us in 2 years or more can choose from a bikini line, underarm, nose, ear, eyebrows, eyebrow tint, or upper, middle or lower back wax FREE or a full Brazilian, the ultimate eyebrow (tint + wax), or full back wax 50% off.

*Valid for select services at participating European Wax Center locations for qualifying guests. To qualify, guest must not have visited any European Wax Center location within two (2) or more years of redemption. Offer is one time use only. Additional terms may apply, see participating center or an EWC associate for additional details. European Wax Center locations are independently owned and operated. © 2024 EWC Franchisor LLC. All Rights Reserved.

*3+1 Pre-Paid Wax Pass® offer valid for new guests at their first visit at participating European Wax Center locations only for select services and limited to same service. Service and package prices may vary by location and are subject to change without notice. Each 3+1 Pre-Paid Wax Pass for new guests will expire 6 months from the date of purchase, unless restricted or prohibited by applicable law. Subject to applicable taxes. Additional terms may apply, see participating center or an EWC associate for additional details. European Wax Center locations are independently owned and operated. © 2024 EWC Franchisor LLC. All Rights Reserved.

A full Brazilian, the ultimate eyebrow (tint + wax), or back waxing is 50% off for new guests. Book now at a center near you and it's on.
